m_szDocSumamry: Federal Solar Tax Credit Generates Green Jobs, Investment and Healthy Taxpayer Returns July 24th, 2012 by Andrew     Contrary to erroneous, misleading assertions to the contrary, the federal government’s Solar Investment Tax Credit (ITC) is proving to be an excellent investment for US taxpayers and the federal budget. The Solar ITC can boast of yielding a 10% internal rate of return (IRR) to taxpayers on the government’s initial investment, according to a study conducted by the US Partnership for Renewable Finance (US PREF).
